Klasse GameState

java.lang.Object
com.wegapplikation.config.controller.GameState
public class GameState extends Object
The GameState class represents the current state of the pathfinding or "Game" logic within the application. It stores the map data (pixel array), the **Start** and **End** positions, and the direction of the last move. This class is designed to be immutable, where methods that modify the state (like moving the current position) return a new GameState object.

  • Konstruktorübersicht

    Konstruktoren

    GameState(int[][] pixelArray, int ex, int ey, int sx, int sy, Direction catDir)
    Initializes a GameState with specified positions and direction.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • GameState

      public GameState(int[][] pixelArray)
      Initializes a new GameState object for a new route, setting the map data and all coordinates to 0.
      Parameter:
      pixelArray - The 2D array representing the map or grid structure.

    • GameState

      public GameState(int[][] pixelArray, int ex, int ey, int sx, int sy, Direction catDir)
      Initializes a GameState with specified positions and direction. This is the primary constructor used to create new states based on existing ones. * @param pixelArray The map data.
      Parameter:
      ex - The x-coordinate of the **E**nd position.
      ey - The y-coordinate of the **E**nd position.
      sx - The x-coordinate of the **S**tart/Current position.
      sy - The y-coordinate of the **S**tart/Current position.
      catDir - The direction of the last move made by the current position.

  • Methodendetails

    • withStartEnd

      public GameState withStartEnd(int ex, int ey, int sx, int sy)
      Returns a new immutable GameState object with specified start (sx, sy) and end (ex, ey) positions. * @param ex The x-coordinate of the End position.
      Parameter:
      ey - The y-coordinate of the End position.
      sx - The x-coordinate of the Start/Current position.
      sy - The y-coordinate of the Start/Current position.
      Gibt zurück:
      A new GameState instance with the provided coordinates.

    • withMoveCat

      public GameState withMoveCat(Direction dir)
      Returns a new GameState representing a move of the current position (sx, sy) in the specified direction. The end position (ex, ey) remains unchanged.
      Parameter:
      dir - The Direction to move the current position (sx, sy).
      Gibt zurück:
      A new GameState with updated (sx, sy) coordinates and the new direction.

    • getpixelArray

      public int[][] getpixelArray()
      Gets the 2D array representing the map structure.
      Gibt zurück:
      The pixel array of the map.

    • getex

      public int getex()
      Gets the x-coordinate of the **E**nd position.
      Gibt zurück:
      The x-coordinate (ex).

    • getey

      public int getey()
      Gets the y-coordinate of the **E**nd position.
      Gibt zurück:
      The y-coordinate (ey).

    • getsx

      public int getsx()
      Gets the x-coordinate of the **S**tart/Current position.
      Gibt zurück:
      The x-coordinate (sx).

    • getsy

      public int getsy()
      Gets the y-coordinate of the **S**tart/Current position.
      Gibt zurück:
      The y-coordinate (sy).

    • getCatDir

      public Direction getCatDir()
      Gets the direction of the last move made by the current position.
      Gibt zurück:
      The last move direction, or null if no move has been made.

    • isStarttheEnd

      public boolean isStarttheEnd()
      Checks if the Start/Current position (sx, sy) has reached the End position (ex, ey).
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the current coordinates match the target coordinates, false otherwise.
